# scaleway_key_manager_key_decrypt_action (Action)

<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key_id` (String) ID of the key to decrypt. The key must have an usage set to `symmetric_encryption` or `asymmetric_encryption`. (UUID format)

- `cyphertext` (String) Ciphertext data to decrypt. Data size must be between 1 and 131071 bytes.

### Optional

- `associated_data` Additional authenticated data. The additional data must match the value passed in the encryption request. Only supported by keys with a usage set to  `symmetric_encryption`.
    - `value` (String) Value of the associated data

- `region` (String) Region of the key. If not set, the region is derived from the key_id when possible or from the provider configuration.
